name: Flyin' (moontr3)
description:
You are testing new wings that scientists have made. They let you fly around their laboratory, and in it, you saw a strange door. You wondered what was there. There was a training ground. You decided to fly on it, but it seems you got lost...

Controls:

W  --  Up
S  --  Down
R  --  Restart
Esc  --  Exit to the main menu

.001 file is the save file for the game.
